column1: The family respectfully requests the honor of your presence at the funeral service honoring the life of Mildred McMahan on Saturday
column3: 2015 at 3:00 pm at the Liberty Hill Baptist Church with the Rev. Ricky Ray officiating. A time to receive friends and share memories and support the family will be from 1:30 pm until 3:00 pm on Saturday
column5: 2015 at the church. Interment will follow in the Liberty Hill Baptist Church Cemetery.
